description: Generate character once, create multiple video segments, then stitch together

inputs.characterPrompt: Professional insurance advisor Aria, 32 years old, attractive female, amber-brown eyes, confident expression. Blue polo with QuoteMoto logo. Natural realistic appearance with subtle imperfections. Modern office setting.

inputs.prompt: Aria introduces herself: 'Hi, I'm Aria from QuoteMoto, and I'm here to help you save money on car insurance.' She smiles warmly and maintains eye contact with the viewer.
Aria explains the benefits: 'Did you know that comparing quotes from multiple insurers can save you hundreds of dollars per year?' She gestures to emphasize key points.
Aria provides the call to action: 'Visit QuoteMoto dot com today for your free instant quote. It only takes 2 minutes!' She points toward the camera with confidence.
